fields.description:
When starting broker with "bin/activemq start xbean:conf/activemq-security.xml" it won't start again after process is terminated with kill -9..

Error:

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed
